1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural entrepreneurs, Aries are often good at making deals and negotiating prices.
2. Taurus - 7/10 - Known for their practicality, Tauruses are decent at budgeting and saving money.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted Geminis are skilled at finding discounts and promotions.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Cancers often prioritize emotional spending over financial responsibility.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Leos have a flair for the dramatic, which can sometimes help them get a good deal.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Meticulous Virgos are excellent at finding deals and saving money.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic Libras often excel at negotiating prices and finding middle ground.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate Scorpios can be intense shoppers, but their intensity can also help them get a good deal.
9. Sagittarius - 6/10 - Sagittarians are often too focused on the big picture to worry about small details like prices.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Ambitious Capricorns are decent at budgeting and saving money, but can be overly cautious in their spending.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian Aquariuses often prioritize helping others over personal financial gain.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Dreamy Pisces tend to get caught up in the romance of shopping rather than considering the cost.
